data.name: Weeping Falls Massacre
data.detailed_description:
January 25th, 1992
Eric Stoll awakens from another nightmare about his past. Over a decade has passed and he's still haunted by it. His mind is made up, he must return to Weeping Falls Orphanage the site of a gruesome massacre.

Play as Eric while you try to uncover what really happened during the events leading up to the massacre.

Decypher the evidence or die trying.
Perhaps save a long-lost friend.

Will Eric survive the night and bring an end to this dark chapter of his life?
Play Weeping Falls Massacre and find out.


Weeping Falls Massacre is an FPS horror game with a 1-2 hour playtime. The game is released as free to play but if you would like to support TaintedPact, you can purchase the Weeping Falls Massacre soundtrack right here on Steam as DLC.

data.short_description: 80's horror inspired FPS, a nightmarish scene taking place at an abandoned orphanage.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 1.8GHz / AMD Athlon X2 64 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-9600K CPU @ 3.70GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
